issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Wrong behavior in SQLFederationStateStore when we want to submit the same application in the same subcluster
fields.summary: Allow SQLFederationStateStore to submit the same app in the same subcluster

comments.body:
Thanks [~giovanni.fumarola] for the patch.
A couple comments before Yetus gives a thumbs up:
* The message is not very clear, it should be something like: Application appId was not present in the State Store. Already present in subcluster X.
* Can we move the } else if { into a single line?

Thanks [~elgoiri] for the feedback.
Attached v2.
